Question: This person won two Grammy awards with Wings, and two as a solo artist.
Hints: This person earned his latest UK number one as of 2012[update] with the title track of his LP release that year, "Pipes of Peace".
Best known for primarily using a plectrum or pick, this person occasionally plays fingerstyle.
According to Spitz, Rhone felt that this person had a compulsion to control situations.
